query:
SELECT
            a.id,
            a.created_by,
            a.title,
            a.description,
            a.image_url,
            a.link_url,
            a.created_at
        FROM advertisements a
        LEFT JOIN ad_impressions ai ON a.id = ai.ad_id AND ai.user_id = $1
        WHERE a.status = 'active'
            AND a.current_impressions < a.target_impressions
            AND (a.expires_at IS NULL OR a.expires_at > NOW())
            AND ai.id IS NULL
        ORDER BY RANDOM()
        LIMIT 10
